item.title: Purpleteam at Alpha
item.description: Where has Kim been for the last couple of years? This post explains why he’s been so quiet and what he has been working on.

item.title: Talk - Building purpleteam (a Security Regression Testing SaaS) - From PoC to Alpha
item.description: Developers / Engineers know that a build pipeline is an essential part of creating robust and reliable software, but what to put in it? This talk covers the creation of purpleteam from PoC to Alpha release, and why itâ€™s an ideal fit for the security regression testing slot of your build pipeline.
